code:
%%{CloudNative_ServiceMesh}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-07.01 — Snapshot & KPI Aggregation (CloudNative_Serverless)

[CloudNative_ServiceMesh] --> SNAPSHOT_INIT : SnapshotStarted (CloudNative_DockerImage)
note right of SNAPSHOT_INIT
  Initialize aggregation window:
  • wall-clock or governance-driven snapshot
  • bind ParamVersion (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
  • allocate run-id for auditability
end note

SNAPSHOT_INIT --> LOAD_INPUTS : WindowBound
note right of LOAD_INPUTS
  Fetch inputs from services:
  • PoC CP/W deltas (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
  • Resonance samples (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
  • Treasury payouts & reserves (CloudNative_DockerImage)
  • Governance decisions (CloudNative_DockerImage)
  • Hub/project signals (CloudNative_Serverless)
end note

LOAD_INPUTS --> COMPUTE_FEATURES : InputsValidated
note right of COMPUTE_FEATURES
  Build feature store:
  • rolling sums / EMA / decay transforms
  • outlier clipping & normalization
  • join by canonical ids
end note

COMPUTE_FEATURES --> COMPUTE_SRI : FeaturesReady
note right of COMPUTE_SRI
  Compute Systemic Resonance Index (CloudNative_HelmChart):
  • aggregate R across domains
  • weighting & alignment factors
  • produce SRI_t and deltas
end note

COMPUTE_SRI --> AGGREGATE_KPIS : SRIComputed (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
note right of AGGREGATE_KPIS
  Aggregate KPIs:
  • CP_i, W_i, project A_j, funding stats
  • coherence trends & alerts
end note

AGGREGATE_KPIS --> PUBLISH : KPIUpdated (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
note right of PUBLISH
  Publish to:
  • UI (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) — dashboards / heatmaps
  • Gov (CloudNative_K8sCluster) — decision support
  • Treasury (CloudNative_DockerImage) — rebalancing
  • Ethics (CloudNative_ServiceMesh) — coherence signals
end note

PUBLISH --> [CloudNative_HelmChart] : SnapshotClosed

%% ---- Integrity / reconciliation paths ----
LOAD_INPUTS --> GAP_DETECTED : MissingInputs / HashMismatch
GAP_DETECTED --> RECONCILE : BackfillRequested
RECONCILE --> LOAD_INPUTS : BackfillCompleted

COMPUTE_FEATURES --> REVIEW : AnomalyDetected
REVIEW --> COMPUTE_FEATURES : ClearedByReview
REVIEW --> FAILED : IntegrityBreach

PUBLISH --> RETRY : PublishError
RETRY --> PUBLISH : PublishRetried

FAILED --> [CloudNative_DockerImage] : SnapshotFailed

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class SNAPSHOT_INIT,LOAD_INPUTS,COMPUTE_FEATURES,COMPUTE_SRI,AGGREGATE_KPIS,PUBLISH,GAP_DETECTED,RECONCILE,REVIEW,RETRY,FAILED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_DockerImage 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_DockerImage'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster'，你看看合适吗？
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_DockerImage。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 CloudNative_ServiceMesh处理。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_ServiceMesh处理'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_Serverless 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_Serverless'？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 的逻辑。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_DockerImage。

对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_ServiceMesh。
